alert.note: Alert for Central Tangipahoa; Lower Tangipahoa; Northern St. Tammany; Northern Tangipahoa; Southwestern St. Tammany (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 3:31PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central St. Tammany and southern Tangipahoa Parishes through 400 PM CDT... At 331 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Independence to near Madisonville. Movement was south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hammond, Covington, Ponchatoula, Independence, Madisonville, Natalbany, Robert and Tickfaw. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 12 between mile markers 35 and 65. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 22 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Tangipahoa; Lower Tangipahoa; Northern St. Tammany; Northern Tangipahoa; Southwestern St. Tammany
